events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening interview focusing on your technical skills and background in software development.
Thank you for your prompt response informing us of your availability for the next interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th, and you will receive details shortly.
You successfully completed your technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and role expectations.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and they were impressed by your interpersonal skills.
We have extended a formal offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation and benefits.
We received your positive feedback and acceptance of the offer, excited to start your journey with us.
You have officially accepted our offer to join as a Software Engineer. Welcome aboard!
Your onboarding process has started. We look forward to helping you integrate smoothly into the team.
The hiring process is now complete. We are thrilled to have you as part of our engineering team.
